titleStmt.title: London, King Charles his Augusta, or, city royal. Of the founders, the names, and oldest honours of that city. An historicall and antiquarian work. Written at first in heroicall Latin verse, according to Greek, Roman, British, English, and other antiquities and authorities, and now translated into English couplets, with annotations. Imprimatur, Na. Brent.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

notesStmt.note: Sir William D'Avenant's name appears in the Address to the Reader.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 7th 1648"; the '8' in imprint date is crossed out and replaced with '7'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
